name: VipRacing TV ( Remove ADS and Center Player )
description: In VipRacing.TV (official partner of Rojadirecta) the remaining ADS are removed (I use Adblock Plus and Anti-Adblock Killer to remove the ads first) and the Video Player is centered. Also, everything outside the video is now darker, to allow a more immersive experience. Enjoy your Formula 1, Moto GP, Football and other sports in a cleaner UI. If you like this please comment and give me some feedback, it would be a great motivation! Thanks.
additional_info: (made for Firefox, in other browsers it may or may not work well) V 1.5 Dark showtimes V 1.4 Also work on .info domain V 1.3 Also the "Programacion" table is now a bit styled, but it's still work in progress, it's only a bit cleaner but I want to make it look better. V 1.2 The "hr" line separating the player and the embed thing is now looking better. Also when the link are clicked there's not that bad looking dotted outline. V 1.1 Visit counter is now removed so everything is cleaner. Also "in-video-ads" that ABP doesn't block are now removed. V 1.0 Improve UI, header is now cleaner and the embed thing on the bottom is now dark, also the line separating the player and the embed thing is now dark. V 0.5 First version, everything at the sides of the player is removed and the player is centered.
